post:
Hello!

This is our first offer post on LES so to celebrate I am giving a 20% onetime discount on all VPS plans using code L7NYO05EZ8. (Using code first cycle is 20% cheaper, prices stated below are not including the discount).

## VM1 
512MB Ram
2 Cores @ 3.4 GHz (Ryzen)
10GB NVME storage
1x ipv4
Unmetered Bandwidth at gigabit
Poland Location
£1.50pm
[Order](https://cms.apeweb.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=14 "https://cms.apeweb.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=14")

£3.50pm

Prices exclude VAT where applicable.

## Features:
noVNC access
virtualizor panel
KVM
NVME storage
Custom plans, windows etc available on request.

## Short terms of service
No TOR exit nodes
No crypto mining
No spam mailing
No port scanning
No public proxies
